product Name: Samsung Galaxy A13 (SM-A135M/DS) Dual SIM,64 GB 4GB RAM, Factory Unlocked GSM, International Version - No Warranty - (White)
about: Display: 6.6 inches, 104.9 cm2 (~83.2% screen-to-body ratio) | 1080 x 2408 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~400 ppi density) | Corning Gorilla Glass 5
Cameras: 50 MP, f/1.8, (wide), PDAF | 5 MP, f/2.2, 123˚ (ultrawide), 1/5", 1.12µm | 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro) | 2 MP, f/2.4, (depth) | 8 MP, f/2.2, (wide)
Battery: Li-Po 5000 mAh, non-removable | Fast charging 15W
Factory Unlocked Smartphones are compatible with most GSM carriers. This phone is not compatible with CDMA carriers like Verizon, Sprint, or Boost.
Product Description: The Samsung Galaxy A13 is packed with 4GB RAM with 64GB of internal storage. The device runs on the Android 11, One UI operating system. It features GPS, USB, and FM radio. It is fueled with a Li-Po 5000, non-removable + Fast charging 15W. Sporting a 6.5 inches PLS TFT display that has a 720 x 1600 pixels resolution. The A13 is built with a Glass front, plastic back, and plastic frame. The A13 is integrated with Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by) capabilities. It features triple camera: 50 MP (wide) + 2 MP (macro) + 2 MP (depth) while on the front there is a 5 MP (wide) camera. The A13 is powered by MediaTek MT6833 Dimensity 700 5G Octa-core processor. The sensors include Fingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, compass, barometer, Virtual proximity sensing.
